name: Choro Stella
description:
What? The universe is quiet you said? 
Not if we can help it!

Join our ancient companions Sopro, Barito, Tenoro, Altono, Tamburo, Sinteto, Baso, Guitaro, and bring us a show with a bang!


Explore the celestial sphere and, the other spheres with a game brought to you from the developers of "I'm Home, and a special guest Swan!
